p: To a stirred solution of 0.130 g (0.465 mmol) (2-amino-5-phenyl-thiophen-3-yl)-phenylmethanone in 7 ml acetic acid was added 62 mg (0.491 mmol) of 1-cyclopropyl-butane-1,3-dione and one drop of sulfuric acid. The mixture was then stirred at 110 °C for 20 minutes in a microwave and then concentrated in vacuo. Preparative HPLC (30% CH 3CN/H 20) afforded 29 mg (17 %) cyclopropyl-(6-methyl-2,4-diphenyl-thieno[2,3-b]pyridin-5-yl)-methanone as a light yellow powder. ES-MS m/e (%): 370 (M+ H +, 100).
